summary: Implements the FastPitch text‑to‑speech model as a NeMo NeuralModule, providing the core network architecture (convolution‑ReLU‑norm blocks, conditional layer normalization, temporal predictors), speaker embedding handling, forward and inference pipelines, and type specifications for inputs and outputs such as token sequences, durations, and mel spectrograms.
business_intent: Enable fast, high‑quality, controllable speech synthesis by converting linguistic features into mel‑spectrograms, supporting multi‑speaker conditioning and duration control for downstream TTS applications.
